title: David’s Final Instructions and Death
summary: Before dying, David instructs Solomon to follow God’s ways and deal wisely with certain enemies. Solomon begins to establish his rule, executing Adonijah, Joab, and others who threatened his reign.

faq.question: What were David’s last instructions to Solomon?
faq.answer: To follow God’s commands and to deal with certain individuals wisely.

faq.question: What did Solomon do to secure his kingdom?
faq.answer: He removed threats by executing Adonijah, Joab, and Shimei.
